result.eng: Put those things in order according to size.
result.ga: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méide
result.orig: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méide
result.html: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méidePut those things in order according to size.
result.ponchtml: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méidePut those things in order according to size.

result.eng: As is usual all over Europe.
result.ga: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpa
result.orig: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpa
result.html: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpaAs is usual all over Europe.
result.ponchtml: De réir mar is gnáċ ar fud na hEorpaAs is usual all over Europe.

result.html: De réir mo chuimhneAs far as I remember.
result.ponchtml: De réir mo ċuiṁneAs far as I remember.

result.eng: We did as we said we would.
result.ga: Rinne muid beart de réir briathair
result.orig: Rinne muid beart de réir briathair
result.html: Rinne muid beart de réir briathairWe did as we said we would.
result.ponchtml: Rinne muid beart de réir briaṫairWe did as we said we would.

result.eng: All you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
result.ga: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
result.orig: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
result.html: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlíAll you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo aċ goid de réir dlíAll you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
